definitionReturnValues.login: `login({ email, password });` - async function to login a user, no return value
definitionReturnValues.isError: boolean - to check if an error occurred
definitionReturnValues.isLoading: boolean - to check if the request is in progress

definitionReturnValues.signUp: `signUp({ email, password });` - async function to create a user, no return value
definitionReturnValues.isError: boolean - to check if an error occurred
definitionReturnValues.isLoading: boolean - to check if the request is in progress

definitionReturnValues.signOut: `signOut();` - function to sign out a user, no return value
